techmeme.title: Numeric, which wants to use AI to automate accounting tasks, raised a $28M Series A led by Menlo Ventures, five months after raising a $10M seed (Marina Temkin/TechCrunch)
Chinese researchers debut AI model Pyramid Flow, which makes a five-second, 384p video in 56 seconds, built using a new technique called pyramidal flow matching (Carl Franzen/VentureBeat)
Google EMEA President Matt Brittin says he plans to step down after a decade in the post and to continue running operations until a successor is chosen (Martin Coulter/Reuters)
Scope3, which makes tools to monitor the carbon footprint of digital ads, raised $25M led by GV to expand into tools for tracking the environmental cost of AI (Tim De Chant/TechCrunch)
Intel unveils its Arrow Lake desktop processors, with an NPU, better power efficiency at higher clock speeds, and 2X the graphics performance vs. its 14th Gen (Gavin Bonshor/The Register)
